name: Colorway women's tank top.
description:
100% combed cotton, made in the USA, American Apparel women's tank top with full-color Colorway logo on solid black shirt.

Screen printed right here in the Pioneer Valley.

These run on the small side but check the sizing chart by copy/pasting this link: 

http://www.americanapparel.net/sizing/default.asp?chart=womens.tank

USPS First Class shipping is free anywhere in the US until Jan 1, 2014.

Thanks so much!

name: Colorway Tee Shirt (men's and women's)
description:
100% combed cotton, made in the USA, American Apparel shirts with full-color Colorway logo on solid black tee.

Screen printed right here in the Pioneer Valley.

These are fitted shirts and aren't as loose as your usual Gildan shirts.

Please refer to the size chart for men's here (please copy/paste the link in your browser):

http://www.americanapparel.net/sizing/default.asp?chart=mu.shirts

And women's here (please copy/paste link in your browser):

http://www.americanapparel.net/sizing/default.asp?chart=womens.shirts

USPS First Class shipping is free anywhere in the US until Jan 1, 2014.

Thanks so much!

name: Colorway Bumper Sticker
description:
High quality vinyl, full color, bumper sticker.

Waterproof and ready for the outdoors.

6"x2"

Free with any purchase of $10 or more. No need to add to cart.

Sticker alone is $2 and ships free to anywhere in the US until Jan 1, 2014.

name: Limited Edition Colorway Pin
description:
Black nickel/hard enamel pin.

Double-posted with rubber clutches.

Limited edition of 100. Numbered on back.

1.5/8" x .5"

Do you have a favorite number from 1-100? Email info@colorwaymusic.com and ask us if we have it in stock. 

USPS First Class shipping is free anywhere in the US until Jan 1, 2014.

After adding to cart please click on "cart" in upper left to bring you to the checkout window.

name: Colorway Debut CD
description: Full-length, self-titled debut album by Colorway featuring twelve original songs. 53 minutes. Full color, 6-panel packaging. Now available! $10 USPS First Class shipping is free to anywhere in the US until Jan 1, 2014. How to buy: simply click on "add to cart" for each CD you'd like to purchase. Then click on the "cart" on the left of your screen to proceed to the checkout page. You will not be charged until after the Paypal page. If you'd like to buy on iTunes simply copy/paste this link into your browser: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorway/id657453922
